name: Draw Brain - Color Dots Dance
description:
This is the hardest brain puzzler based on real physics! The concept is really simple. Try to meet the two balls with the help of objects that you draw yourself.
The objects and the balls react to physic laws, so keep that in mind.

The game is very simple to play but extremely challenging but fun at the same time . Just put your finger on the screen and try to draw a path of lines from one ball to another.

Looks easy? Try it out and let us know your feedbacks to make it even better!

Have fun!
